title: Welcome to NaNDay.dev blog!
summary:
Hi everyone and welcome to my personal blog!

We're going to talk about software development, personal finance, videogames, boardgames and tabletop roleplaying games.
body:
Hi everyone and welcome to my personal blog!

We're going to talk about software development, personal finance, videogames, boardgames and tabletop roleplaying games.

Have a great day!
